about_the_game:
Our World is Full of Happiness. But for some people, happiness may not be available... And some already have to lose it forever. These lost people have an opportunity to find eternal peace and harmony. But they must sacrifice their body to you.

You are a creature without a body, lost in time and burdened by an only one idea.
To put an end to the "Bloody Renaissance" cult. You exist due to the puppets — people who have sworn allegiance to you, who obey you, and who prepared to give their lives for you. Your enemy is the true nature of this world... A force so dark and ancient that you are incapable of understanding it.

The ending of the story depends only on you.

Your decisions count, your personality affects the outcome of this bloody game...
Mind Control is a game that plays with you such as you play it.
Get one of four endings and see if you get a "good" ending.

Unique Combat System.

The "Triple R" (Railgun-Realtime-RPG) system is a mix of a railgun shooter and a Japanese RPG.
Operate dynamic semi-tactical combat with multiple opponents at the same time.
Assess your strength on merit, fight to the last or flee the battlefield to save your life.

Memorable Characters in unusual situation.

Change your playable characters as the story progresses. Your puppets obey you but they haven't lost their personality.
As they do your will they comment any events in their own way and communicate with other characters.

Death may take everyone.

The world of this game is very brutal because every character in this story can die. Are you able to save all your puppets?

Each playthrough is unique.

High variability and a system of random events ensure that each player has their own unique experience as they make their way through the game.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of graphic violence and gore, use of drugs and alcohol, nudity and scenes of sexual nature.
